description: Create mock UI for CodeRef Scanner interface integrated into dashboard. UI-only mockup with clean empty states, no live data. Inherits global dashboard layout, sidebar navigation, and breadcrumbs.
requirements: Mock up scanner interface UI (projects list, console tabs, action bar)
Use extracted design tokens from layout-coderef-scanner-2026-01-01.json
Inherit global dashboard layout (sidebar nav + breadcrumbs)
NO dark mode toggle on page (inherits global theme)
Clean empty states for all sections
NO live data or functional scanning - UI mockup only
constraints: Must inherit existing dashboard layout system
Must use existing Tailwind config and design tokens
Must integrate with existing sidebar navigation
NO backend integration or data fetching
NO separate dark mode toggle (uses global theme)
Must have proper empty states (no hardcoded project paths)
Fixed heights (h-[500px]) should be replaced with responsive flex patterns

config.text:
Mode: Universal Structure

avoid_copying: Fixed heights (h-[500px]) - use min-height or flex-grow instead
Hardcoded project paths - use empty states
Inline Tailwind config - use existing dashboard config
Separate dark mode toggle - inherit from global theme
z-index values - use dashboard's z-index system
CDN dependencies - use dashboard's build process

theme_inheritance.inherit_colors: Use dashboard's existing color system where possible

technical_notes.state: Client Components for interactive elements (tabs, checkboxes)
technical_notes.accessibility: Semantic HTML, ARIA labels, keyboard navigation

mockup_guidelines.data: NO live data - use empty states or 1-2 placeholder items max
mockup_guidelines.functionality: NO actual scanning - buttons are non-functional mockups
mockup_guidelines.polish: Clean empty states, proper spacing, hover states
mockup_guidelines.responsive: Test at mobile, tablet, desktop breakpoints

deliverables: Updated sidebar navigation to include Scanner route
Screenshots of empty states at all breakpoints
success_criteria: NO dark mode toggle on page (inherits global)
NO live data or backend calls
Hover states and interactions feel polished
Matches design tokens from extracted layout
